## Summary

Describe what changed and why.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Docs
- [ ] CI/build

## Validation

- [ ] Ran app locally (`npm start`)
- [ ] Built app (`npm run build:win`) or explained why not
- [ ] Added/updated docs where needed

## Screenshots (UI changes)

Attach before/after screenshots or GIFs.

## Checklist

- [ ] No secrets included (cookies, tokens, session keys)
- [ ] Scope is focused and minimal
- [ ] Backward compatibility considered
